Object Oriented Programming

Oct 12, 2015

This is my first attempt at a technical blog or any blog for that matter. So what is Object Oriented programming ? It is an approach towards designing a solution to a problem by modelling to the problem context.In other words, you would be designing the solution to a problem by actually identifying the participants, their interactions and having them as objects in your design. Your design should replicate what the objects in the problem should/can do. Let us take an example : Problem Context :
